wikitext.*:
The '''Battle of the Silent Pools''' took place at [[Aelin-uial|Umboth-muilin]] during the [[War of Wrath#Other versions of the legendarium|great expedition]] from [[Valinor]] to release the enslaved [[Gnomes]] in the [[Great Lands]], according to some of the outlines belonging to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name="Tulk"/> No full, detailed account of the battle is given, as it is only mentioned passingly in the ''Lost Tales'', and in various outlines for their continuation.

What little is known about it is that:
*It was fought between [[Tulkas]] and [[Melko]], in which Tulkas defeated the latter, and Melko was afterwards bound in [[Lumbi]] and guarded by [[Gorgumoth]] the hound of [[Mandos]].<ref name="Tulk">{{LT2|VI}}, outline '''1''', p. 278</ref>
*Afterwards, [[Angamandi]] was broken, and the captive Gnomes were released.<ref name="Tulk"/>
*Following the end of that war is a war with many of the [[Men]] living in the Great Lands, as soon as the [[Valar]] Tulkas and [[Salmar|Noldorin]] returned back to Valinor.<ref name="Tulk"/>
